column6: "WANDERLOST" We open literally one second after the shattering conclusion of "Messiah War," and Cable's mission to save mutantkind has never looked more bleak. In fact, you can't even call it a mission anymore... After all he's been through, after all he's survived...now all Cable can do now is pray-pray the heavily-armed killers roaming the deep future can't match his survival skills. And what is the fate of Hope-the so-called "Mutant Messiah"?  Rated T  ...$2.99
column8: | editor:Axel Alonso | letterer:Joe Caramagna | inker:Paul Gulacy | colorist:Thomas Mason | writer:Duane Swierczynski | penciller (cover):Dave Wilkins
